item.title: W10-S1 Euler’s Method and Graphical Solutions for Autonomous DE
item.description: 周次: 10 日期: April 27, 2022 节次: 1 In this lecture, we talk briefly on the numerical method for solving an initial value problem for a general first order differential equation. The method is called Euler’s Method, it is the most simplest numerical method for solving a differential equation. Secondly, we will look at how to sketch graphical
